high_descs: Take the clock from the dresser.
Turn around, go forward to the wall, turn right, go forward to the night stand.
Turn the lamp on the night stand on.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a clock near a lit lamp.

high_descs: Move backwards then face the cabinet
Pick up the alarm clock on the cabinet
Turn left then walk forward turn right and head to the side table
anns.task_desc: Examine the alarm clock by the light

high_descs: look at the grey box on top of the dresser
take the grey box form the top of the dresser
turn to the left twice and go to the wall and turn to the right and go to the nightstand with a lamp on it
anns.task_desc: Examine a grey box by the light of a nightstand lamp
